rooms.description: Wide entrance with foyer and storage cabinet adhering to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Open space area with large windows facing east, designed for natural light and family interactions.
Adjacent to living room for comfortable meals, integrated open plan layout.
Functional space with modern amenities and Vastu compliance, north or east facing window recommended.
Guest room located on the ground floor for convenience, designed with privacy and sound insulation.
Connected to guest bedroom; equipped with essential plumbing fixtures.
Small utility space for laundry or storage, adheres to local norms.
Spacious master suite with en-suite bathroom, east-facing window for positive energy.
Private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom.
Additional master suite ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu for positive energy flow.
Shared bathroom for bedrooms, designed according to Indian building codes.
Dedicated study area with north or east facing window as per Vastu.
Split-level loft that spans multiple rooms, ideal for a multifunctional family space with ample natural light.
Additional guest bedroom, designed for convenience and privacy.
Facility for the loft area or guest usage, following local norms.
Spacious terrace with garden view, designed for relaxation and social gatherings while ensuring structural support and weather-proofing.
